column4: can someone tell me how u ssh to another server pc from ubuntu?
is that service (sshd) running on the computer your attempting to connect to ?
then you need to type: ssh host in a terminal
does the EXACT same thing it does in putty
with so many posts in the channel, its beneficial for you to post the users nick, at the beginning of your reply, so someone knows who you are talking to
please read my two previous posts, before replying anymore
it asks for a password not a login
its using your username on your system
press enter, it will prompt for a username, then a password
thats the last time I am posting that into to you
i cannot be of any further assistance to you, good luck
